slokas: श्रीभगवानुवाचमय्यासक्तमना: पार्थ योगं युञ्जन्मदाश्रय: ।असंशयं समग्रं मां यथा ज्ञास्यसि तच्छृणु ॥ १ ॥
slokas_translated: The Supreme Personality of Godhead said: O son of Pṛthā, please hear from Me as I am attached to Me, O son of Pṛthā.

slokas: ज्ञानं तेऽहं सविज्ञानमिदं वक्ष्याम्यशेषत: ।यज्ज्ञात्वा नेह भूयोऽन्यज्ज्ञातव्यमवशिष्यते ॥ २ ॥
slokas_translated: I shall now explain to you in detail about the knowledge of the Vedas, which are known to you in detail.

slokas: मनुष्याणां सहस्रेषु कश्चिद्यतति सिद्धये ।यततामपि सिद्धानां कश्चिन्मां वेत्ति तत्त्वत: ॥ ३ ॥
slokas_translated: Someone in the thousands of human beings strives for perfection, and some of the perfected persons know Me in fact.

slokas: भूमिरापोऽनलो वायु: खं मनो बुद्धिरेव च ।अहङ्कार इतीयं मे भिन्ना प्रकृतिरष्टधा ॥ ४ ॥
slokas_translated: The earth, water, fire, air, sky and intelligence are divided into eight parts, namely, egoism and egoism. .

slokas: अपरेयमितस्त्वन्यां प्रकृतिं विद्धि मे पराम् ।जीवभूतां महाबाहो ययेदं धार्यते जगत् ॥ ५ ॥
slokas_translated: O mighty-armed one, know that this universe is the ultimate nature of myself, the living entity, the living entity, the living entity and the living entity.

slokas: एतद्योनीनि भूतानि सर्वाणीत्युपधारय ।अहं कृत्स्नस्य जगत: प्रभव: प्रलयस्तथा ॥ ६ ॥
slokas_translated: Please understand that all living entities are the sources of all living entities, and I am the source of all living entities and dissolution.

slokas: मत्त: परतरं नान्यत्किञ्चिदस्ति धनञ्जय ।मयि सर्वमिदं प्रोतं सूत्रे मणिगणा इव ॥ ७ ॥
slokas_translated: O Arjuna there is nothing better than Me, O Arjuna, for all this is strung in the thread like clusters of gems.

slokas: रसोऽहमप्सु कौन्तेय प्रभास्मि शशिसूर्ययो: ।प्रणव: सर्ववेदेषु शब्द: खे पौरुषं नृषु ॥ ८ ॥
slokas_translated: O son of Kunti, I am the radiance in the waters, and I am the light of the moon, the sun and the sun.

slokas: पुण्यो गन्ध: पृथिव्यां च तेजश्चास्मि विभावसौ ।जीवनं सर्वभूतेषु तपश्चास्मि तपस्विषु ॥ ९ ॥
slokas_translated: I am pious and fragrance on the earth and I am the effulgence of fire and I am the life of all living beings and I am the austerities of all living beings. .

slokas: बीजं मां सर्वभूतानां विद्धि पार्थ सनातनम् ।बुद्धिर्बुद्धिमतामस्मि तेजस्तेजस्विनामहम् ॥ १० ॥
slokas_translated: O son of Pṛthā, know Me to be the eternal seed of all living entities. .

slokas: बलं बलवतां चाहं कामरागविवर्जितम् ।धर्माविरुद्धो भूतेषु कामोऽस्मि भरतर्षभ ॥ ११ ॥
slokas_translated: O best of the Bharatas I am the strength of the strong and devoid of lust and passion for all living entities. .

slokas: ये चैव सात्त्विका भावा राजसास्तामसाश्च ये ।मत्त एवेति तान्विद्धि न त्वहं तेषु ते मयि ॥ १२ ॥
slokas_translated: I am not in Me, but I am not in Me.

slokas: त्रिभिर्गुणमयैर्भावैरेभि: सर्वमिदं जगत् ।मोहितं नाभिजानाति मामेभ्य: परमव्ययम् ॥ १३ ॥
slokas_translated: The entire universe is deluded by these three modes of nature, which is deluded by these three modes of nature.

slokas: दैवी ह्येषा गुणमयी मम माया दुरत्यया ।मामेव ये प्रपद्यन्ते मायामेतां तरन्ति ते ॥ १४ ॥
slokas_translated: My illusory energy is insurmountable to me, for those who take refuge in Me alone, the illusory energy of Me alone, protect me.

slokas: न मां दुष्कृतिनो मूढा: प्रपद्यन्ते नराधमा: ।माययापहृतज्ञाना आसुरं भावमाश्रिता: ॥ १५ ॥
slokas_translated: Those who are fools and who have taken away their knowledge of the demons, who have taken refuge in the demoniac nature, do not take refuge in Me.

slokas: चतुर्विधा भजन्ते मां जना: सुकृतिनोऽर्जुन ।आर्तो जिज्ञासुरर्थार्थी ज्ञानी च भरतर्षभ ॥ १६ ॥
slokas_translated: O Arjuna, O best of the Bhāratas, I am in distress, inquisitive and seeking wealth.

slokas: तेषां ज्ञानी नित्ययुक्त एकभक्तिर्विशिष्यते ।प्रियो हि ज्ञानिनोऽत्यर्थमहं स च मम प्रिय: ॥ १७ ॥
slokas_translated: The wise are ever engaged in devotional service and one is the most dear to the wise. I am very dear to the wise. He is dear to Me. .

slokas: उदारा: सर्व एवैते ज्ञानी त्वात्मैव मे मतम् ।आस्थित: स हि युक्तात्मा मामेवानुत्तमां गतिम् ॥ १८ ॥
slokas_translated: All these are generous to Me, and I think that the self is self-controlled.

slokas: बहूनां जन्मनामन्ते ज्ञानवान्मां प्रपद्यते ।वासुदेव: सर्वमिति स महात्मा सुदुर्लभ: ॥ १९ ॥
slokas_translated: At the end of many births, the wise man attains Me. .

slokas: कामैस्तैस्तैर्हृतज्ञाना: प्रपद्यन्तेऽन्यदेवता: ।तं तं नियममास्थाय प्रकृत्या नियता: स्वया ॥ २० ॥
slokas_translated: Those who have taken away their knowledge of the demigods, who have taken away their knowledge of the demigods, who are self-controlled by their own nature and who are self-regent in their own nature.

slokas: यो यो यां यां तनुं भक्त: श्रद्धयार्चितुमिच्छति ।तस्य तस्याचलां श्रद्धां तामेव विदधाम्यहम् ॥ २१ ॥
slokas_translated: I shall establish the same body as a devotee of the Supreme Personality of Godhead with faith and worships Him with His faith.

slokas: स तया श्रद्धया युक्तस्तस्याराधनमीहते ।लभते च तत: कामान्मयैव विहितान्हि तान् ॥ २२ ॥
slokas_translated: Endowed with that faith, he obtains the worship of the Lord and obtains the desires of the Supreme Personality of Godhead.

slokas: अन्तवत्तु फलं तेषां तद्भ‍वत्यल्पमेधसाम् ।देवान्देवयजो यान्ति मद्भ‍क्ता यान्ति मामपि ॥ २३ ॥
slokas_translated: The final rewards of these lowly persons are the same as the demigods who perform low intelligence and the demigods go to Me, and they attain Me.

slokas: अव्यक्तं व्यक्तिमापन्नं मन्यन्ते मामबुद्धय: ।परं भावमजानन्तो ममाव्ययमनुत्तमम् ॥ २४ ॥
slokas_translated: Those who are ignorant of the unmanifest incomplete person do not know Me, knowing that My transcendental nature is incomprehensible to Me.

slokas: नाहं प्रकाश: सर्वस्य योगमायासमावृत: ।मूढोऽयं नाभिजानाति लोको मामजमव्ययम् ॥ २५ ॥
slokas_translated: I am not illuminated by the illusory energy of all mystics. This foolish world does not recognize Me, the unborn and inexhaustible. .

slokas: वेदाहं समतीतानि वर्तमानानि चार्जुन ।भविष्याणि च भूतानि मां तु वेद न कश्चन ॥ २६ ॥
slokas_translated: O Arjuna, I know that I am the past and the future, and no one knows Me, and no one knows Me. .

slokas: इच्छाद्वेषसमुत्थेन द्वन्द्वमोहेन भारत ।सर्वभूतानि सम्मोहं सर्गे यान्ति परन्तप ॥ २७ ॥
slokas_translated: O descendant of the enemy, by the delusion of duality arising from desire and hatred, all living entities are deluded in creation, O scorcher of enemies.

slokas: येषां त्वन्तगतं पापं जनानां पुण्यकर्मणाम् ।ते द्वन्द्वमोहनिर्मुक्ता भजन्ते मां दृढव्रता: ॥ २८ ॥
slokas_translated: Those who are free from the delusion of duality and who are deluded by the delusion of duality and who are deluded by the dualities of their pious activities .

slokas: जरामरणमोक्षाय मामाश्रित्य यतन्ति ये ।ते ब्रह्म तद्विदु: कृत्स्नमध्यात्मं कर्म चाखिलम् ॥ २९ ॥
slokas_translated: Those who strive for the liberation from old age and death and strive for the Absolute Truth know that all that is spiritual and all other activities. .

slokas: साधिभूताधिदैवं मां साधियज्ञं च ये विदु: ।प्रयाणकालेऽपि च मां ते विदुर्युक्तचेतस: ॥ ३० ॥
slokas_translated: Those who know Me as the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, who know Me as the Supreme Personality of Godhead. .
